name: Thor Odinson
thoughts: Step Aside COFFEE This is a Job for ALCOHOL! I have a big job tomorrow!!!

name: selina Kyle
thoughts: Not to get technical, But according to chemistry ALCOHOL is a solution & I need a solution today!

name: Barry Allen
thoughts: Everybody’s got to believe in something. I believe I’ll have another beer because today was unbelievably bad

name: Peter Parker
thoughts: Either give me more wine or leave me alone, I've had enough customer interaction today.

name: David Thomas
thoughts: I never laugh until I’ve had my coffee & I sure could use a double shot (of espresso) today!

name: Natasha Romanoff
thoughts: Like my granny used to say, 'Nothing lasts forever so live it up, drink it down, laugh it off'. Missing her today..

name: Diana Prince
thoughts: My doctor told me to watch my drinking, so I’m off to find a bar with a mirror.

name: Ororo Munroe
thoughts: I can’t fully espresso my excitement! It was the best day ever! I need a drink to match my mood

name: David Bruce Banner
thoughts: They said I could be anything, so I decided I wanted to be caffeinated! 14 shots ought to do it!!

name: Loki Laufeyson
thoughts: you know what they say-Three shots a day keeps the doctor away!
